creator: JBlond@gmail.com
text:
In /docs/trunk/misc/security_tips.html there is written

"Especially the event mpm is currently incompatible with mod_ssl and other input filters."

Event mpm supports ssl. 

"the experimental event mpm uses"

Event mpm is no longer experimental

Fixed in r1205885
Backported in r1205886

Please review and reopen if necessary.
creator: i.galic@brainsware.org
